name: Eureka: The Time I got into a Lab Accident and became a Chemistry Wizard
name_original: Eureka: The Time I got into a Lab Accident and became a Chemistry Wizard
description:
Eureka: The Time I got into a Lab Accident and became a Chemistry Wizard is a game where you play as Ricka’s laboratory partner as you and Ricka are sent into another world due to a science experiment that went wrong. Here, you and Ricka embark on a quest and must utilize the knowledge you have over chemistry in order to go home

Battle through many fantasy creatures through your elementoids and compounds.  Learn through battles and use your knowledge in chemistry that you have and may gain through the playing the game to your advantage. You must first get through the dangerous Caglio Forest and defeat the creatures that dwell within it.
